thread.title: A New Online Street Map Set To Change The Way People Find Local Businesses
thread.title_full: A New Online Street Map Set To Change The Way People Find Local Businesses

author: prbuzz.com
title: A New Online Street Map Set To Change The Way People Find Local Businesses
text:
An Interactive site, streetviewmaps.city allows users to travel virtually through to 1.3 Million Cities online.
Recently launched site, StreetViewMaps.City has become a major player in the online street map world. With this innovative, interactive, new website, users can explore businesses, establishments, and tourist attractions around the world - without ever leaving the comfort of their homes.
StreetViewMaps.City is a geographical application with more than one million cities, spanning the globe, in its database. Tying together elements recognized by Google Places, it then applies added levels of detail for each location that users can choose to view.
The online street map allows users the opportunity to wander the street views of cities around the world as if they were there in person. One needs only to pick a destination, type it into SteetViewMaps.City , and begin.
Users can navigate this new street view with easy to read icons displayed on their screens, detailing the different businesses that they are encountering. People can find everything from banks, to doctorâ€™s offices, to grocery stores, and tourist attractions.
With an easy to navigate functionality and clean, modern design, people will find this to be a thoroughly enjoyable user experience.
Features like a click and drag function, to help make searching easier gives users immediate access to what they are searching for. The new icons for places, businesses, and more provide an easy solution to find local businesses.
To learn more about StreetViewMaps.City please visit http://www.streetviewmaps.city/
About StreetViewMaps.City
StreetViewMaps.City is a worldwide geographical website application with over 1,300,000 worldwide cities in its database.
